page.title: 06H0USING IN ONGAR
page.content: In Ongar about{90%}of the people own their own houses.{10%}of the people rent their houses, almost all living on the council estate. We established that {75%} of Ongar people had lived here over five years. Under half of the people interviewed had moved from{"the Greater London {Area",}though lots of them had moved because of their jobs or because the houses were cheaper at the time.Not many first time buyers or O.A.P.'s come to Ongar; because the houses are mainly designed for families. The most popular houses in Ongar are {3/4 bedroom detached}and{semi_detached {houses.}Most buyers tend to like houses on newly built estates.Others buy houses just outside Ongar where they can be within easy reach of the station.Some houses in Ongar date back to the 14th Century.
